title: FTC plans to bar Meta from monetizing teens’ data after privacy lapses
description: The agency wants to update a 2020 settlement with the Facebook parent company after allegations that the company misled parents about its Messenger Kids app.

title: Big Tech-funded groups try to kill bills to protect children online
description: Tech groups funded by Amazon, Google and Meta are pushing to kill state bills to protect children online.

title: The completely correct guide to organizing your phone screen
description: The completely correct guide to organizing your phone screen

title: Amazon is paying small-town florists and funeral homes to deliver packages
description: In a new program, Amazon is paying small businesses in hard-to-reach places $2.50 per package delivered.

title: See how a quick-fix climate solution could also trigger war
description: A technology called geosolar engineering is a cheap and fast way to fight global warming. But it could also spark conflict.
